TopicTitle: This Blog is absolutely hilarious. And sooooo Kerbal!

Articles.Content: https://what-if.xkcd.com/28/ This is one of my favorite entries. A lot of the questions are so Kerbal it's not even funny like "Could you get to space only using model rocket motors" or "Could you make a Machine Gun Jetpack." A lot of the question don't seem very Kerbal at the beginning, but the answers a lot of times are.

"Could you make a Machine Gun Jetpack." A lot of the question don't seem very Kerbal at the beginning, but the answers a lot of times are.

How is that question NOT Kerbal at the beginning?

How is that question NOT Kerbal at the beginning?

Not that one specifically. I'm talking about ones like this:https://what-if.xkcd.com/4/

I think Kerbin just gained a third moon: Mole

Oh man, I was like "I should check this out..." and I just read 12 entries!
